other_tests.findings: Evidence of remote infarcts of the right frontal and left parietal lobes, as well as diffuse white-matter disease.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Findings consistent with previous cerebral infarcts; diagnosis of new infarct made one month prior to the presentation.

other_tests.findings: Moderate left ventricular systolic dysfunction, mild-to-moderate mitral regurgitation, a patent foramen ovale, and no evidence of thrombus in the left atrial appendage.

Left ventricular dilatation and dysfunction (ejection fraction, 38%), right ventricular hypokinesis, biatrial dilatation, a patent foramen ovale with an interatrial septal aneurysm, aortic-valve sclerosis, and mild mitral regurgitation.
